trans-unit.source: Represents a selectable item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> contains a collection of ListBoxItem objects.
To select a ListBoxItem in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A> property to `true`.
Bind a ListBoxItem to data by binding the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to a data source.
For more information, see [How to: Bind a ListBox to Data](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [하는 방법: 데이터 ListBox 바인딩할](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can customize the appearance of a ListBoxItem by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> 속성</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> 을 설정 하 여 ListBoxItem의 모양을 사용자 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
By default, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> of a ListBoxItem is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>.
The default horizontal position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>.
If you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> property of a ListBoxItem through a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, the panel's default is applied and the item is centered.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>속성을 통해 ListBoxItem는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, 패널의 기본값이 적용 되 고 항목 가운데에 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A ListBoxItem is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: ListBoxItem는는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, 즉, 모든 형식 (예: 문자열, 이미지 또는 패널)의 단일 개체가 포함 될 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
Customizing the ListBoxItem Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ListBoxItem controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 여러 개의 ListBoxItem 컨트롤을 사용 하 여 동일한 속성 설정을 적용할는 ListBoxItem 컨트롤을 사용자 지정의 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 기본값을 수정할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>고유한 모양을 제어할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 만들기에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, 참조 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ListBoxItem, see [ListBox Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 부분 및 ListBoxItem 관련 된 상태를 보려면 참조 [목록 상자 스타일 및 템플릿](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을이 컨트롤은 컨트롤의 기본 스타일으로 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 속성은 응용 프로그램에이 컨트롤이 표시 하는 경우 속성이 기본값에서 변경 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 응용 프로그램이 실행 중인 때 사용 되는 데스크톱 테마에 따라 결정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
> [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ListBoxItem control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 시각적 속성을 설정만 영향을 미칠 속성 시각적 ListBoxItem 컨트롤의 기본 서식 파일에 속성이 있으며를 사용 하 여 설정 된 경우는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: "변경의 시각적 구조의 정도 제어" 섹션의 시각적 속성 목록을 찾을 수 있습니다 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref> is selected.
trans-unit.target: 표시 하는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"> </xref> 을 선택 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To select a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, set this property to `true`.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`||

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>항목이 선택 되 면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected*> dependency property.
To be added.

Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 적절 한 제공 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> 의 일부로이 컨트롤에 대 한 구현을 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 자동화 인프라입니다.

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation.
Called when the mouse enters a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref>.
The event data.
Called when the mouse leaves a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref>.
The event data.
Called when the user presses the right mouse button over the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 위에서 마우스 오른쪽 단추를 누를 때 호출 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Called when the user presses the right mouse button over a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 위에서 마우스 오른쪽 단추를 누를 때 호출 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref> is selected in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 될 때 호출 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"> </xref> 에서 선택한는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A> property changes to `true`.
The event data.
Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref> is unselected in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 될 때 호출 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"> </xref> 에서 선택이 취소 되는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A> property changes to `false`.
The event data.
Called when the visual parent of a list box item changes.
trans-unit.target: 목록 상자 항목의 시각적 부모가 변경 될 때 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The previous <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref>.
Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref> is selected.
To know when the selection in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> changes, listen for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 알 수 있는 선택 항목은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>에 대 한 변경 내용을 수신 대기는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>
